sentences.en: Sibyl Vane tossed her head and laughed.
sentences.cn: 茜比尔·范把头往后一仰,大笑起来.

sentences.en: Sibyl, you are mad about him.
sentences.cn: 茜比尔, 你在神魂颠倒地迷恋他.

sentences.en: Sibyl: if a mirror looks into a mirror, what is there to see?
sentences.cn: 如果一面镜子看着一面镜子, 里面能看到 什么 ?

sentences.en: Sibyl: There really ought to be compensation in cases like this.
sentences.cn: 西柏: 像这类事情实在应该要有赔偿.

sentences.en: The sibyl ("witch" is such an uncouth label) responded with a supply constriction designed to drive up the price.
sentences.cn: 女预言家（“女巫”听上去让人不太舒服）则用限制供应的方法来应对，意在推升价格。

sentences.en: The Sibyl gave no aid to restoring them again, and the oracle was irreparably lost.
sentences.cn: 西比尔不会把它们恢复原状, 神谕便无可弥补地丢失了.

trans.tran_en: (in ancient Greece and Rome) any of a number of women believed to be oracles or prophetesses, one of the most famous being the sibyl of Cumae, who guided Aeneas through the underworld
